short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: EnConvo Campanion extension used for give browser content to Enconvo

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A browser extension to give more context to EnConvo


Transform your web browsing with this powerful extension that seamlessly connects to EnConvo AI, enabling intelligent website analysis, content summarization, and automated browser tasks.

This extension acts as a bridge between your browser and EnConvo, providing deep contextual understanding of your active tabs. Simply use the {{current_browser_tab}} variable in EnConvo to create sophisticated AI-powered workflows.

Key Benefits:

âœ¨ One-click page summarization with our integrated "Summarize This Page/Url" feature

ðŸŽ¯ Build custom AI workflows that intelligently process your current browser content

---

Important: EnConvo desktop application must be installed on your Mac to use this extension.
